name: Villagers vs Robots Run
description:
If you have the free version, your progress will be transferred with iCloud.

Help the villagers in this fast and challenging one-touch platform game. You need to jump to avoid enemies and obstacles. This game is more challenging than your typical platformer since you can not jump on the enemies to kill them.

If you are having difficulty, you can click the normal or easy button. You can also choose level 1 or 4. The game starts difficult at level 6.

Features

- One-touch game
- Choose your villager
- Collect three coins in each level
